topic.title: ZeroNet零网真的厉害啊，不过我也不太懂这个，望大神指点。
topic.body:
翻墙软件今天集体失效了，试了一下这个软件，没想到还可以用，看起来像是个论坛软件似的，只能在这里交流是吧，这是个什么软件？请用简练语言解答，多谢。
Today the collective failure of special software, try this software, did not think it can also be used to look like a forum software like, only here to exchange it, this is what the software? Please answer in terse language. Thanks a lot.

1_1FwnyMb8moVvSgy1VXNoJTLNoN7mTTTnHm.body:
> [rwxy](#comment_4_1G2KAr146veEMjvkrhD3sXMUH1fAuZdswM): This's English version . The Chinese one is http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit这是英文版，点右上角的中文论坛

thank you。
